text: Welcome to BBC parliament's live
coverage of the House of Commons.
In an hour's time the Treasury
Minister Greg Clarke will respond
to an urgent question from Labour
on banking reform. Earlier today,
the Chancellor, George Osborne,
announced that the UK's big banks
will be broken up if they fail to
follow new rules to separate risky
investment operations from high
street outlets. The International
Development Secretary will then
update MPs on the humanitarian
response to the current crisis in Syria.
